name: Burgerator for Android
tagline: Team Hamburgerler's CS480/481 project to port the Burgerator iOS app to android + a 2.0 revision
body:
## Welcome to The Hamburgerlers' CS 480/481 senior project home page.

***

Our CS480 project is a port and update of _the Burgerator iOS app to Android_. We are working with the app's founder, Ammar Shallal from NYC. The update will include the ability to browse the app without the need to log in, capturing location data upon opening the app, and possibly updates to the social functionality - allowing users to more easily follow other Burgerator users.

The Hamburgerlers' vision is to fulfill the expectations of our client by porting the successful IOS Burgerator app to Adriod. In this process we will perform the desired upgrades to the app to take it to the next level, Burgerator 2.0!

Client: Ammar Shallal ammar@burgerator.com

Our dev team is composed of CWU CS seniors:   
K. Haro harokevin0@gmail.com  
L. Garcia garcialui@cwu.edu  
A. Michel alecmichel@gmail.com  
J. Hammond hammondjo@cwu.edu  

Faculty Advisors:  
Dr. Szilard VAJDA  
Dr. J. Schwing schwing@cwu.edu

***

Our repository which includes our code and documentation is located at:  
https://github.com/designbot9000/Burgerator_Android/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
